title: Short Ghost and Horror Collection 003
creator: Various
description: A collection of fifteen stories featuring ghoulies, ghosties, long-leggedy beasties and things that go bump in the night. Expect shivers up your spine, the smell of human flesh, and the occasional touch of wonder. Readers include: BellonaTimes Mark Bolton Laurence Measy Bernard Spiel Linda Ferguson Aravis Sean Michael Hogan P. D. Wright M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobook; ghost; horror
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
